title: Bajaj looks to expand Triumph range, sales network to fuel future growth
description: Bajaj Auto aims to expand its Triumph brand presence in India's mid-size motorcycle segment. The company plans to increase its sales network to 170 outlets by year-end and over 200 next year. Bajaj recently launched two new 400-cc bikes, Speed T4 and Speed 400, priced at Rs 2.17 lakh and Rs 2.4 lakh respectively.
